current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the small, rural school achievement program and
		  the rural and low-income school program under part B of title VI of the
		  Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Health, Education, Labor,
			 and Pensions

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Rural Education Achievement
			 Program Reauthorization Act of 2013

				uses for the fiscal year.
